title: Millionaire YouTuber Hank Green tells Gen Z to rethink their Tesla bets—and shares the portfolio changes he’s making to avoid AI-bubble fallout
description: The S&P 500’s record concentration in AI-focused companies like Nvidia, Microsoft, and Google could bear bad news in the event of a bubble pop, says YouTuber Hank Green.

title: Nvidia CEO says data centers take about 3 years to construct in the U.S., while in China ‘they can build a hospital in a weekend’
description: China has “twice as much energy as we have as a nation, and our economy is larger than theirs. Makes no sense to me,” Huang said.

title: Nvidia Just Piled $2 Billion Into This Artificial Intelligence (AI) Chip Designer. Should Investors Follow Suit?
description: The AI chipmaker has been investing billions of dollars into AI-related ventures.

title: The Hater's Guide to Nvidia
description: This piece has a generous 3000+ word introduction, because I want as many people to understand NVIDIA as possible. The (thousands of) words after the premium break get into arduous detail, but I’ve written this so that, ideally, most people can pick up the details early on and understand

title: Nvidia takes $2 billion stake in Synopsys as AI deal spree accelerates
description: Nvidia has invested $2 billion in chip design software maker Synopsys as part of an expanded multi-year tie-up to jointly develop new ​tools for designing products across industries using its AI technology.  The deal, unveiled by the companies on Monday, ‌comes as Nvidia has carried out a range of investments, such as those in OpenAI and Anthropic, to try to cement its dominance in the ‌artificial intelligence market.  The Synopsys deal is about shifting the work of several high-tech industries that are just starting to adopt AI away from central processing units used in the past and toward the graphics processing unit chips sold by Nvidia.

title: Famed short seller Jim Chanos sees risks in growing debt market backed by Nvidia’s AI chips: 'There's going to be debt defaults'
description: Nvidia's AI chips have been used as collateral by emerging cloud companies to secure big loans.

title: China's tech giants move AI model training overseas to access Nvidia chips, FT reports
description: Alibaba and ByteDance are among the tech firms training their newest large language models in Southeast Asian data centres, the report said,⁠ citing two people ‌with direct knowledge of the matter.  Nvidia ‍declined to comment on the report.  Chinese companies rely on lease agreements for overseas data centres owned and operated by non-Chinese entities, the newspaper said, noting that DeepSeek, which gathered a large stock ⁠of Nvidia chips before the ​US export bans, was an ​exception with its model being trained domestically.

title: Nvidia reportedly no longer supplying VRAM to GPU partners due to memory crunch
description: Nvidia typically bundles the GPU and VRAM together.

title: Nvidia stock falls after report says Google, Meta in talks for multibillion-dollar AI chip deal
description: Nvidia stock fell amid a report from The Information that Google is in talks with Meta for a big chip deal.

title: Markets wipe $250 billion off Nvidia as they digest Google’s revenge, with Gemini 3 emerging as ‘current state of the art’
description: What if AI’s version of Google turns out to be…Google?

title: Nvidia is so spooked by Google’s sudden AI comeback that it’s posting on X to defend itself
description: “We’re delighted by Google’s success,” Nvidia said, perhaps passive aggressively.

title: Nvidia: Happy for you, Google, but we're still better
description: A report sent shares of Nvidia tumbling as concerns increase that Google is coming for its chip business.

title: Google's on a roll — and Nvidia and other chipmakers are feeling the heat
description: Meta is reportedly considering buying Google's AI chips for its data centers in the coming years, adding to the selling pressure on Nvidia stock.

title: Nvidia says its GPUs are a 'generation ahead' of Google's AI chips
description: It was in response to Wall Street's concern that Google's TPU chips could threaten Nvidia's dominance of the AI infrastructure industry on Tuesday.

title: Read Nvidia's rebuttal to Michael Burry's criticism that the AI chip titan has hurt shareholder value
description: In a memo to a Wall Street analyst, Nvidia directly responded to a recent X post from Michael Burry that was critical of the company.

title: Stocks Extend Gains on Rate-Cut Bets, Nvidia Drops: Markets Wrap
description: Technology stocks helped extend a rally in global equities into a third day, fueled by mounting expectations of a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut in December.

title: Meta and Google Discuss Deploying TPUs in Meta Datacenters Starting 2027
description: Investing.com -- Google is sharply escalating its bid to rival Nvidia in the AI chip race, and Meta is emerging as a potential multibillion-dollar customer, The Information reported Monday evening. For years, Google has limited its custom tensor processing units (TPUs) to its own cloud data centers, renting them out to companies running large-scale AI workloads. But according to The Information, Google is now pitching the chips for deployment inside customers’ own data centers, marking a major s

title: AI rivals like OpenAI, Nvidia, and Oracle are collaborating to build ‘Stargate’—but a Yale expert says it violates 135 years of antitrust law
description: Six AI leaders are uniting to form a single company. How is this possibly legal, asks Madhavi Singh of Yale’s Thurman Arnold Project, an initiative dedicated to antitrust issues.

title: The internet is loving 'Big Short' investor Michael Burry's crusade against Nvidia and the AI giants
description: Michael Burry of "The Big Short" is lighting up social media after betting against Nvidia and Palantir and casting doubt on the AI boom.

title: Why Nvidia is being punished for delivering a blockbuster earnings report
description: Nvidia investors sold upon hearing good news, while everyone else is buying into a Fed rate-cut scenario.

title: Nvidia CEO says the company is in a no-win situation amid AI-bubble chatter, leaked meeting reveals
description: “The market did not appreciate our incredible quarter,” Huang said.

title: Nvidia CEO says AI will actually make everyone a lot busier: ‘Everybody’s jobs will be different’
description: “I would say that there's every evidence that we will be more productive and yet still be busier because we have so many ideas,” Jensen Huang said.

title: Stock Rally Wanes at End of Worst Week Since April: Markets Wrap
description: Wall Street traders reeling from a bout of wild stock gyrations sent the market wavering Friday as sentiment remained fragile, with crypto getting hammered and Nvidia Corp. extending its selloff.
